entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
